detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition

This Edition of HoD is the Founder Edition. Start your dark journey with a Huge amount of starting Gold and items. Get a special pet that will follow you everywhere you go. Also you will get the Class "blood sorcerer" for free.


Limited Edition

The founder Edition includes following: - A unique special pet. - a unique special cosmetic item-set. - a darkness weapon-skin - a huge amount of starting Gold and items. - access to the special darkness Camp. - your Name will be mentioned in the credits as a supporter.
